metadata.Title: CVE-2017-14130 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: The _bfd_elf_parse_attributes function in elf-attrs.c in the Binary File Descriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.29, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (_bfd_elf_attr_strdup heap-based buffer over-read and application crash) via a crafted ELF file.

criterions.comment: binutils package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.29.1-1ubuntu1').
